description: This file defines REST API endpoints for managing network devices, including listing, creating, retrieving, updating, deleting, and pinging devices. It uses Flask with Flask-Smorest, interacts with a MongoDB database, and includes utility functions for device status checks.

classes.name: DevicesList
classes.description: API resource for listing and creating devices

classes.name: DeviceItem
classes.description: API resource for retrieving, updating, and deleting a specific device

classes.name: DevicePing
classes.description: API resource for pinging a device and updating its status

methods.name: _objid
methods.description: Converts a string ID to a MongoDB ObjectId, aborts with 404 if invalid

methods.name: _timestamps_for_create
methods.description: Generates timestamp fields for device creation

methods.name: _timestamp_for_update
methods.description: Generates timestamp field for device update

methods.name: _safe_ping
methods.description: Performs a safe reachability check on an IP address or hostname
